alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 845 PM MST... At 800 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olberg, or 9 miles northwest of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Olberg, Bapchule, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 174 and 189. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
